name: Nara
welcomeDec: Connecting you to the decentralized web and Nara network.

welcomeDecList.2: Stake Nara to earn rewards. Help the Nara network remain decentralized.
welcomeDecList.4: Quickly revoke access connection given to apps.

activated.title: ACCOUNT NOT ACTIVATED
activated.text1: To create this account to the Nara ledger, you will have to make a first deposit of a minimum {0} Nara.
activated.text2: Your reserved Nara will not show up within your Nara Wallet balance as you cannot spend it.

select.createDec: This creates a new wallet and a 12-word recovery phrase.
select.importDec: Import your existing wallet by entering the 12-word recovery phrase.

create.title: Create Password for This Wallet
create.termsDec: I read and agreed to the
create.dec: Create a wallet to start a trip to Nara.

backup.title: Wallet Created Successfully!
backup.dec: Your recovery phrase makes it easy to back up and restore your account.
backup.warningDec: Never disclose your secret recovery phrase. Anyone can take over your account with it.

rules.password: Must contain numbers uppercase letters lowercase letters, length 6-12.
